title: The Benefits Of Software Engineering
summary: Software engineering is a broad field that encompasses a number of sub-disciplines. Systems Engineers are responsible for developing large-scale systems used in industrial, commercial, or government applications. Application Engineers are also responsible for managing teams and projects, and designing solutions that meet the needs of the business. You can find job opportunities in software engineering by networking with other professionals, reading job boards, and attending various hiring events, such as hackathons. If you have a computer and an internet connection, you can find a job as a software engineer in nearly any country in the world.
